column4: Hi, anyone know why sudo would just stop working.  I was SSHed into my system and it was working fine then all of a sudden it wasn't working anymore.  Rebooted and it is still not working.  No errors just acts like it does nothing.
take a look at /var/log/authlog , sudo logs there
I tried...but permission denied...and I can't sudo to look at it
type groups in a terminal; as the first system user you should be in the adm and admin groups (adm should let you see authlog, admin do sudo)
